text.0: News: Scientists use gene therapy and a novel light-sensing protein to restore vision in mice https://t.co/hmidUFIUgy
text.1: During the #COVID19 pandemic, getting your flu shot is more important than ever. I got a #flushot not only to protect myself, but also those around me, and to help reduce the burden on our healthcare system. #FluVaccine #GetVaccinated #FluFighter #FoilTheFlu #FightFlu #Influenza https://t.co/23oxofQRlZ
text.2: I recently rolled up my sleeve for my flu shot at #NIH! It’s more important than ever to #Sleeveup to #FightFlu. Together we can protect our hospitals from a “double whammy” of flu & #COVID19 patients while protecting our health. Find a location near you: https://t.co/7Gjxnv8G7b https://t.co/A1d0LwxnYv
